results.title: Glucose and lipid metabolism during long-term lisinopril therapy in hypertensive patients.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ produced significant falls @<m>DISEASE_Hairy_palms_and_soles</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535620 @@@in both@@@ systolic and @DISEASE_Heart_Murmurs @DISEASE_MESH:D006337 @@@diastolic@@@ blood pressure @<m>DISEASE_Hairy_palms_and_soles</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535620 @@@in both@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ groups during the long-term therapy.
